name: Dicey Dungeon
description:
Conquer your fears in this roguelike where you choose how to make each level harder. Each level, you must choose a fear to conquer, and each one has its own unique form of punishment.

Let the dice roll how they may, but stack the odds in your favor by purchasing more dice as you progress.

Created for Mini Jam 83.

Controls:
WASD / Arrow Keys to move.

Interact with object and attack enemies by moving into them.
